thread.title: Ortiz, Esther
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Ortiz, Esther

author: Ortiz, Esther
title: Ortiz, Esther
text:
The registration was pretty good and looked like all was covered. The departure was good too The unit needs some updating we had to call exterminator for roaches not good. The noise in one room because of water heater and had issues w dishwasher and the blender burn upon first use. The maintenance dept reacted quick which was good and handled all issues we were inconvenienced a bit waiting for maintenance personnel.
Otherwise the unit it's okay. Everything else was ok. The area was pleasant though beach is very far unfortunately
The overall experience was good.
